front.title: Unapproved Draft IEEE Standard for Metal-Oxide Surge Arresters for AC Power Circuits (>1 kV) (Revision of IEEE C62.11-1999) Superseded by C62.11-1999

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: To implement new information to reflect evolving technology and industry practices, and to clarify, reorganize, and improve the presentation of the application Guide. The scope of the revised standard will be the same as the current standard, including arresters applied to a transformer secondary below 1000 V ac for the purpose of protecting the transformer.
